title: HiSET Recycling Prompt
prompt:
Recycling allows trash to be repurposed for new products, decreasing the amount of waste. Your city has just implemented an improved curbside recycling program that allows more items to be recycled, including glass, plastic, paper, and cardboard. Your community is dedicating this month’s newsletter to the new recycling program.

Write an essay for your community newsletter in which you argue that every resident should begin recycling one new type of recyclable waste. Think carefully about what reasons will convince your neighbors to recycle.
feedback: Thank you for your response! We will grade your essay and get you feedback soon.
